Subject: A use case for mining an ARC file.
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=185567631
X-Yahoo-Profile: penguinoamante2

Find all the pages that have "mailto", "contact", or that match the
regular expression "(\d\d\d)\d\d\d-\d\d\d\d".  

It is unclear how I would do this using the tools from
http://www.netarchive.dk.  

ExtractCDX creates a file with urls and offsets.  BinSearch searches
the cdx files for lines begining with a prefix.  I have yet to
discover how to return anything but the first line of the cdx file.

Also there is a jakarta project called
(http://jakarta.apache.org/lucene/docs/index.html).  Is that something
to use to create an index from an ARC file?

Thanks
